metadata.title: CVE-2021-30535 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Double free in ICU in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.77 allowed a remoteattacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30535` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu67 - 67.1-7ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '67.1-7ubuntu1').
